Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose System for In Vitro Coagulation Studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Berichrom Heparin LMW Calibrator and Controls for calibration and quality control of LMW heparin measurement with the Berichrom Heparin assay.
Indications for Use Summary: Calibrator and assayed controls intended for the calibration and assessment of precision and bias in quantitative measurement of low molecular weight heparin with the Berichrom Heparin assay.
